valid.input.max_length: The length of the entered characters cannot exceed {1} digits.

valid.input.min_value: The value of the input should be more than or equal to {0}.

valid.input.password: The password must be  8 to 63 characters long and include both upper and lower case letters and numbers.
valid.input.password.diff: The new password and the confirmation password do not match.
valid.input.phone: Please enter a valid phone number. It must be 1 to 31 characters long.
valid.input.phone_or_email: Please provide a valid email or phone number. The email should be between 5 and 255 characters long and follow the format XXX@XXX.XX. For the phone number, it should be between 1 and 31 characters long and consist of digits only.

valid.input.port: Please enter a valid port number.
valid.input.postal_code: Please enter your postal number in the required format: numbers, letters, spaces, and special characters such as (). -+*#. The length of the input should be less than 32 digits.

valid.input.range_value: The value you enter should be greater than or equal to {0} and less than or equal to {1}.

valid.input.start_with_normal_char: Required Format: the input must start with lower case letters (a-z), upper case letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), or underscores (_).
valid.input.start_with_ws_wss: Please enter a valid URL. It must start with ws:// or wss://.

valid.input.string_rules_two: Only uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>@[]^_`{|}~ are allowed.
valid.input.two_sixteen_hexadecimal: Please enter two 16-bit hexadecimal values, separated by “-” for the range.
